name: zammad
description: Zammad is a self-hosted helpdesk and ticketing system. It integrates with email, chat, and telephony, supports multi-channel tickets, and exposes a modern web UI and APIs, alongside commercial cloud hosting.

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Manage support requests from email, chat, phone, and social media in one unified interface

features.title: Email Integration
features.description: Convert incoming emails to tickets automatically with threading and attachment handling

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Build a searchable help center with articles that can be linked to tickets or accessed

features.title: Ticket Workflows
features.description: Automate ticket routing, assignment, and status changes based on customizable rules and triggers

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Add internal notes, mention colleagues, and collaborate on tickets without exposing details to customers

features.title: Sla Management
features.description: Define and track service level agreements with automatic escalations for overdue tickets

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Analyze ticket volume, response times, and agent performance with built-in analytics
